summary: A cynical American expatriate gets involved in smuggling and gun-running for the rebels during the 1925 Syrian insurgency against French occupation.
cast: Humphrey Bogart|Märta Torén|Lee J. Cobb|Everett Sloane|Gerald Mohr|Zero Mostel|Nick Dennis|Onslow Stevens|Ludwig Donath|David Bond|Abdullah Abbas|Leon Alton|Tony Barr|John Bleifer|Dick Botiller|Peter Brocco|Argentina Brunetti|Jack Chefe|Tristram Coffin|Edward Colmans|Joe Connors|Harry Cording|Jeff Corey|Carmen D'Antonio|Al Eben|Paul Fierro|Bernie Gozier|Harry Guardino|John Halloran|Chuck Hamilton|Jean Hartelle|George Khoury|Tony Layng|Eddie Le Baron|Peter Mamakos|Paul Manning|Paul Marion|Myron Marks|Merrill McCormick|Louis Merrill|Carl Milletaire|Marta Mitrovich|Neyle Morrow|Jay Novello|Peter Ortiz|Alfred Paix|Joe Palma|Josephine Parra|Leonard Penn|Roland Rego|Vincent Renno|Julian Rivero|Ric Roman|Gabrielle Rossillon|Jack Santoro|Cosmo Sardo|Joe Sawaya|Sam Scar|Dan Seymour|Sammy Shack|Robert St. Angelo|Felipe Turich|Peter Virgo|Ralph Volkie|Martin Wilkins|Guy Zanette
title: Siroco
